Duan Xing Xing

Height:
5'10" (178 cm)

Introduction

Duan Xing Xing is a Chinese singer under M-Nation and a former member of the project boy group IXFORM. He launched his solo career on April 21, 2021, with the release of the digital single "I Will." He gained notable recognition as a contestant on the survival shows Youth With You 3 and Starlight Boys.
